title: If there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed
description: When there is no data available for a series, a user-friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user.
EB: When there is no data for a series, a helpful error message should appear to remind the user.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the series page.
3. Verify that the series does not have any data available.
4. Observe if a friendly error message is displayed.
